title: Foundations of Visual Communication Design Using Digital Tools (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and elementary understanding of digital image editing
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones (not PCs), with the goal of acquiring basic design skills for public projects related to science communication

learning_goals: Utilize smartphone-based graphic design apps (e.g., Canva) to create poster layouts for science-related topics.
Apply digital color theory and visual hierarchy to design effective science communication materials.
Analyze the visual clarity and creativity of design solutions through peer assessment and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
